participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and optimistic, Emily often seeks to make the most out of her free time by exploring new hobbies and interests.
participant_1.background: Emily graduated from university with a degree in literature and enjoys reading and writing in her spare time.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Sociable and adventurous, Michael loves engaging in conversations and sharing experiences with others.
participant_2.background: Michael works in graphic design and has a keen interest in outdoor activities, often spending weekends hiking or biking.

content.text: I have so much free time
